meanings.sent1: The smallish puppy fit in the tiny basket.
meanings.sent2: She picked a smallish apple from the tree.
meanings.sent3: The smallish cat tried to climb the huge tree.
meanings.sent4: The smallish pebble skipped across the water.
meanings.sent5: The smallish flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.

meanings.sent1: The smallish book was easy to carry in her bag.
meanings.sent2: He wore a smallish hat to shield himself from the sun.
meanings.sent3: The smallish umbrella protected her from the light rain.
meanings.sent4: The smallish boat gently rocked on the calm lake.
meanings.sent5: The smallish bird chirped happily in the tree.
